website_summaries.verdict: Targeted cream from a top brand that contains minerals and plant extracts, including plankton.
pros: Formula is silky and smooths out lines and leaves skin looking dewy
Made by a popular brand in premium beauty products
cons: Some find the fragrance too heavy

customer_reviews.title: Luv the Face and Neck Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Estee Lauder Resilience that is lower priced then the other retailers. I love the Face and Neck cream because it says what it does and more. My skin is softer and as you age you need that extra moisture for less wrinkles. Third is my second jar purchase and my first with Amazon and I will buy at Amazon again and a real cost savings from this vendor. The cream was fresh a nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This leaves my skin so silky smooth and it has firmed up my fine lines a ton. I'm 63 and I saw a difference right away.
customer_reviews.author: CKD

customer_reviews.title: i love it.
customer_reviews.text: This cream is light and refreshing on your face. Not heavy at all. I have been using it forever. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: Look out for previously used and/expired product
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product had already been used and has expired. Maybe it was transported in conditions that caused it to dry up or "spoil". It did not absorb into skin. Paid higher amount for in box. Have purchased product from other retailer and it has much different and better consistency. Recommend product but not through this retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam4

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I e been using this cream 25plus Years. My skin is so soft and creamy. I love it. I am 63 and my wrinkles are minimum
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product is not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real estee Lauder Resilience I've had before. It has a terrible smell to it. It is either not the real thing or is completely out of date. Not even the same ingredients. Will never buy from this retailer again. Amazon should get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky M Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received and item was expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Received Wong item. Should be resilience firm not resilience multi-lift. I don't like to return items and this item was expensive
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Went back to this after trying Oil of Olay. Estée Lauder is much better!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Great price point for the brand as well
customer_reviews.text: My go to for Day and night moisturizing. For all skin types. Highly recommend. Great price point for the brand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaya

customer_reviews.title: Decent moisturizer, lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: Those are the good things about this. I've been using this for about a month combined with another Estee product and so far I haven't seen any evidence of "lift/firming/sculpting". It's a decent moisturizer for me - no more no less.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful 🌷
customer_reviews.text: 🌷I gave my Mom for X’mas gift and she loves it🌷
customer_reviews.author: Nawlar Saywah

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer! Makes my skin glow and feel soft. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best facial cream in the market.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Estee Lauder product for years. It is very good for my skin, especially in the colder temperatures. Really lifts and moisturizes the face and throat. First time I purchased through Amazon, price was much better than local retails stores.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My skin felt very soft and refreshing it had a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years! Best face cream I've found ( especially now that my skin is aging) and worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Diana C

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product bothers my face. I am using it as a hand cream unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Urszula Banas

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I love Estee Lauder Resilence Lift. I use it every night before bed. My face feels soft and the lines not as visible. It has a very soft fragrance which doesn't linger. It last a long time. You don't need to use much. Truly worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I do see results with this so it is good, but maybe not the best for me. The jar is pretty and the lotion goes on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: MARSHA L BRYAN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just what the wife wanted and at a better price than the mall.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Foutch

customer_reviews.title: Priced to high
customer_reviews.text: I purchased thinking it would be comparable to what I buy at the department stores but the price was much higher. Won't be buying this again....
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bollig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this resilience cream! It has really helped my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but good
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but if it lasts 4 months it's worth it. We'll see...
customer_reviews.author: leslie whelan

customer_reviews.title: Great produce. Great service.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Great service. It was delivered on time with a small present (bonus) I didn't expect to have. It makes a difference. Elina
customer_reviews.author: Arovetli

customer_reviews.title: Love Estee Lauder resilience lift!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years and have purchased it typically from a big name department store, but the price offered on Amazon is less expensive. I wish I had ordered this before! Great product and I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: LSimpson

customer_reviews.title: Got a tube, not a jar
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product - I've been using it for a long time - but I received a TUBE (in a box). I don't want a TUBE, I want the jar, as it shows in the picture. For the price I paid, I want the jar!
customer_reviews.author: Tea Lover

customer_reviews.title: ... have use this for two or three years and love it it makes your skin so soft people think ...
customer_reviews.text: I have use this for two or three years and love it it makes your skin so soft people think I am 10 years younger than I am am
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT ON MY REALLY DRY FACIAL SKIN!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a moisturizer. I use on my face wherever I have dry skin after washing my face good every morning and at nighttime but only nighttime when necessary because it works so good for really dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great products pretty good price. I use this every day
customer_reviews.author: amersh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much I was happy when it came but it took a little longer to get here but it was worth the wait. I love my face cream
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product daily for years. It's. a great lift as well as daily Sun protection. I see the bottle pkg has changed, so know its a fresh EL batch.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Arnett Richards

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Used to get at macy's
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Used to get at macy's. Glad to see it on your site.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Logue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Estee Lauder and have used this product for years.
customer_reviews.author: Lizjw

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I highly recommend it for your skin care.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dauzat

product_meta.title: Estee Lauder Resilience Lift Firming/Sculpting Face and Neck Creme Broad Spectrum SPF 15 for Normal / Combination Skin 1.7 oz
product_meta.description: Size:50ml/1.7 OunceYou want it all-- the lifted look, the firmer feeling and the radiance that reflects how beautiful you are. This intensely nourishing formula, with our exclusive Photo-Activated Lift Complex, harnesses the beneficial power of light to help skin boost its natural collagen and elastin production for a multi-faceted lift. Skin rebounds as facial contours appear sculpted and newly defined. Radiance is re-ignited. And you start to look as young as you feel.
feature_bullets: A face and neck cream to give the complexion a youthful, lifted, firmer look.
Over time, skins strength, resiliancy, and volume appear renewed and youll see a remarkably younger, revitalized look.
This is an intensely nourishing formula with our exclusive Photo-Activated Lift Complex.
Harnesses the beneficial power of light to help skin boost its natural collagen and elastin production for a multi-faceted lift.
Skin rebounds as facial contours appear sculpted and newly defined. Radiance is re-ignited.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
